name: Starwagen Corp
description:
Please don't forget to give feedback down bellow in comment section. Every little feedback is very important <3

Currently still in progress,  please follow me on twitter @papa_alpha_papa for more updates

I am a solo dev. Working from AM to the PM as a professional programmer and developing this game on my free time slots. 

But I promise to keep you updated minimum once every week!

Its a Rogulelike Deckbuilder game. 

Current Version: A pre-alpha build (proof of concept version) for windows only. 

Description: 

Become part of a breathtaking journey through the universe. Create your own strategy for turn based combat. Pay attention to the effects that influence your ship. Destroy enemies and collect rewards.  

Explore a new randomized galaxy every game (1)

And experience roguelike permadeath

TODOS: 

  • Region-Subregion map system (Milestone 2)

  • Text based Events  (Milestone 2)
  • Procedural Generated Map (Milestone 3)
  • Distress Mode (Where challenging encounters will spawn more) (Milestone 3)
  • Secret Tiles (Milestone 3)
  • Traveling Enemy (Milestone 4)
  • Advenced AI (Milestone 4)
  • More cards (Milestone 4)
  • More Effects (Milestone 4)
  • More Items (Milestone 4)
  • Quest and Enemy Varieties  (Milestone 4)

 (1): (WIP) will be avaliable in Milestone 3
